name: GPS Holder - Top
description: This part securely holds the top section of the BZ-181 GPS module in place on the T-Dongle S3. It's designed to snugly fit around the module while providing easy access to necessary ports.

name: GPS Holder - Bottom
description: This part serves as the base for the BZ-181 GPS module, mounting it firmly to the T-Dongle S3. It aligns perfectly with the top holder to provide a stable and fit for the GPS module onto the TDongle.
